Text:
Great album! 

La Villa Strangiato is perhaps one of their best pieces, IMO.

Enjoy :)
oh yeah totally, the drums are simly perfect. oh and that solo, wooww

Man you are a good judge of quality and sound  I  designed one of the greatest speaker systems of the 70s. so I know how good vinyl can sound and how bad the early Cds and most modern ones sound, well done
